brief_title: Dextroamphetamine as an Adjunct in Cocaine Treatment - 1
brief_summary: The purpose of this study is to evaluate dextroamphetamine sulfate (sustained release) as an adjunct in cocaine treatment; an evaluation of the ""replacement"" strategy.
description: 15 mg for first 8 weeks and 30 mg for 2nd 8 weeks
30 mg for the first 8 weeks and 60 for the second 8 weeks (16 weeks total)
